channel.title: NEED HELP with setting npc behaviors to aggressive and walking paths
channel.description: I NEED BIG HELP on making npc's set to aggressive behaviors and adjusting thier walking paths, because ive tried setting thier paths then compiling then they dont move...like wats goin on can please some1 help ;)
